thread.title: ‘The Walking Dead’ Mashed With The ‘Friends’ Intro Is Just Too Perfect
thread.title_full: ‘The Walking Dead’ Mashed With The ‘Friends’ Intro Is Just Too Perfect

author: Bryan Brunati
title: ‘The Walking Dead’ Mashed With The ‘Friends’ Intro Is Just Too Perfect
text:
‘The Walking Dead’ Mashed With The ‘Friends’ Intro Is Just Too Perfect Genius. Feb 21st, 2017 Photo: YouTube 
Since all of you awesome folks loved watching Luke Cage mashed-up with Family Matters , it’s time to take a look at another two popular shows and what they would look like if they were mashed-up. The two shows this time around? The hugely popular The Walking Dead , and perhaps the even bigger show, the classic comedy Friends . 
Thanks to the Woodcreek Fashion , all of us Walking Dead fans get to see Rick, Michonne, Daryl and the rest of the group thrown into a Friends intro. And boy, if this was the real intro this show might be even better. Now all we need is the Walker version of Ross and we would be set to go. 
Take a look at the hilarious intro below. ‘The Walking Dead’ Mashed With The ‘Friends’ Intro Is Just Too Perfect 
I don’t know about you, but I’m ready for the makers of this show to make this the new intro. I mean, they might as well since they seem to be shaking things up. And I’m sure all of you wouldn’t have an issue with it at all.
